text:
Recommendations

   • Further studies are needed to investigate the effects of combining

     antipsychotics with THC on psychiatric symptoms.

   • Research should focus on determining the optimal dosing regimens for

     these substances.

   • The mechanisms by which antipsychotics interact with THC should be

     further investigated.

References

[1] Kane, J. M., & Marder, S. R. (2010). Efficacy of antipsychotic drugs in

patients with schizophrenia: A review of the literature. Journal of Clinical
